articles.description: On Saturday, Karthik was dismissed by Kuldeep Yadav for a golden duck. With the dismissal, he entered the list of batters with the most number of ducks in IPL history
articles.content: Dinesh Karthik revived himself with a phenomenal performance in last years Indian Premier League (IPL) for the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB). On the back of 330 runs in 16 matches at a strike rat… [+1952 chars]

articles.title: JioCinema will start charging users for content after IPL 2023 ends, here are the details - India Today
articles.description: Reliance-backed JioCinema will begin charging its viewers for OTT content after the end of IPL 2023. The pricing of these plans, however, is yet to be finalised.
articles.content: By Divyanshi Sharma: JioCinema made a lot of headlines when IPL 2023 viewership on the platform broke all records this year. The ongoing IPL 2023 can be live-streamed at the OTT platform, which is av… [+2227 chars]
